column1: All of the love in my life is gone.
ive made some breakfast and coffee
@support people here are pretending to be my deceased son  can you please stop this? I am hurting.
The warmer months means motorcycles are back on the road. Please do not take a single second of your life for granted. Rest gently  my baby.
This holiday season  remember to cherish what is truly important. I miss you with every part of me  my Christmas Angel. Rest In Peace.
We miss you so much  you perfect angel. Happy Birthday  my sweet boy. Thinking of you every second of every day.
I am severely depressed and I don't know what to do. Some days I can not even get out of bed. Some days I miss him so much I want to die.
sometimes RT @TassinroberT: @coffee_dad does anyone die soon?
Going through old photographs. They may be faded  but my love for you never will. We miss you sweet son. Always and forever.
sometimes RT @BudYourLife: @coffee_dad @danyule_ I would like some coffee please.
sometimes RT @arianagates: @coffee_dad what's ur fave coffee
Please leave me alone today. This is a very difficult day for our family. Thinking of you always my son.
sometimes RT @tj_fitzpatrick: why is @coffee_dad slugging coffee at 8 at night?
thinking of a big cup of coffe#e
When the air starts to cool and the leaves begin to change  I feel a pain so deep in my heart that I can't stand it. I'll love you forever.
i still remember everything from the day he was born the smell of his perfect hair his tiny fingers happy birthday my sweet son we miss you
I can't take this much longer.

I'll never forget the last thing he said. I'll never forgive myself.

do you know what my son is being for halloween? a ghost  because he decided to drink and drive.
